plot: After Nolan and Talia lose control of a crime scene, they begin to debate whether people are fundamentally good or bad and what that means for a police officer. Meanwhile, Lucy is concerned Tim is enabling his wife's destructive behavior and not taking care of himself.—ABC website

Supervisor Tim Bradford deals with a bank employee who got trapped inside a safety wall but is frustrated to find his junkie wife and ex police colleague Isabel unwilling to accept any help, blowing off steam by taunting her bikers gang. While Nolan proves ever better at patrol work, supervisor Talia is most impressed by his excessive loyalty, prepared to take the blame for her incompetence.—KGF Vissers

A gang dressed like zombies steal money from a cash machine and Nolan and Talia hunt one criminal in the subway. They capture the thief, but a musician in the train steals the bag of money. They discuss whether people are good or bad. Tim meets his drugged wife Isabel in the hospital after an OD and he has a strange behavior, affecting the safety of Lucy.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
